Alias.name: /wsiowe
/sztolnia

/exp_zabij1
Alias.script: zabij1 = (matches[2]) cecho ("<yellow>Arkadia-Expowiska: Podbindowalem <light_slate_blue>" .. zabij1 .. "<yellow> pod klawisz <light_slate_blue>ALT+Z.\n")

Alias.name: /exp_zabij2
Alias.script: zabij2 = (matches[2]) cecho ("<yellow>Arkadia-Expowiska: Podbindowalem <light_slate_blue>" .. zabij2 .. "<yellow> pod klawisz <light_slate_blue>ALT+X.\n")

Alias.name: /exp_zabij3
Alias.script: zabij3 = (matches[2]) cecho ("<yellow>Arkadia-Expowiska: Podbindowalem <light_slate_blue>" .. zabij3 .. "<yellow> pod klawisz <light_slate_blue>ALT+C.\n")

Alias.name: /exp_zabij4
Alias.script: zabij4 = (matches[2]) cecho ("<yellow>Arkadia-Expowiska: Podbindowalem <light_slate_blue>" .. zabij4 .. "<yellow> pod klawisz <light_slate_blue>ALT+V.\n")
